unnormalised: OMG, you guys! Get ready for some garam chai-level celebrity gossip that's hotter than a Chennai summer!
normalised: Oh my G, you guys! Get ready for some garam chai-level celebrity gossip that is hotter than a Chennai summer!

unnormalised: First up: word on the street (aka Filmfare magazine and anonymous Instagram accounts) is that Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor are planning a lavish vow renewal ceremony in Udaipur! Can you imagine? It's gonna be even bigger than their wedding, apparently with Bollywood's entire who's who on the guest list. Sources are saying there might even be a performance by AR Rahman! Talk about epic!

unnormalised: And speaking of weddings, remember that rumor about Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal hitting a rough patch? Well, those rumors have been squashed faster than a mosquito in monsoon season. Apparently, they just returned from a super romantic getaway to the backwaters of Kerala, where they celebrated Onam with a traditional sadhya. Talk about couple goals!

unnormalised: In other news, Karan Johar was spotted having lunch with Suhana Khan and Agastya Nanda at Bastian, Bandra. Speculations are running wild! Is he planning on casting them together in his next big Dharma Productions movie? Sources say it might be a campus drama set in Delhi University. Imagine the drama!

unnormalised: Also, Ranveer Singh was seen ordering a massive biryani from Hyderabad House for a late-night craving. Relatable, tbh. Who can resist a good biryani after a long day of shooting? Speaking of which, his new film, *Bajirao Mastani 2* (just kidding… or am I?), is already creating buzz!

unnormalised: Finally, whispers are that Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas are considering buying a palatial bungalow in Lonavala, overlooking the hills. Perfect for raising baby Malti and hosting some epic Diwali parties, right? We're talking major Bollywood-Hollywood crossover vibes here! Stay tuned for more spicy updates, folks! And remember, take it all with a pinch of namak! This is showbiz, baby!
